column5: two men were arrested after a family dispute.------A 19-year-old man living in Damnak village
column8: Kampot province and a 55 year old living in the same house were detained by police following a disturbance.------The daughter of the older man told police he would often get drunk and threaten the family with an old grenade. Cops seized the explosive to build a case and take legal action. ------AREY
